data.message: This was so good. God bless us all. Much love to you all.💄💋🙏

replies.message: Hi Anquenette. We're glad you enjoyed the Year in Review video! -Neha

Hello .... I need help :/ . Someone made a fake account with my name on it and he/she sends messages to everyone. Can someone help me ? How can I contact Facebook-service? Help me please :( . Take contact with me, please.
We're sorry to hear that you are experiencing this, Yesil. If someone created an account pretending to be you, we recommend reporting it by following these steps: http://bit.ly/2jV2sK1. -Jon
I've reported them but Facebook did not delete that account :/ .
Facebook I said hello blue marker in these are my personal How Pour Alama
Hey Yesil. Thanks for the follow up. You can learn more about checking the status of an account you reported on Facebook here: http://bit.ly/2keQc4q. We hope this helps. -Jon
Facebook I have tried contacting  you guys several times. I need help with my account
